progress.wait_for_pairing_mode:
To complete setup, put this device in pairing mode.

### How to enter pairing mode
1. Force quit Ooler mobile apps.
2. Press and hold the power button on the device. Release when the bluetooth icon starts blinking (approximately 5 seconds).

bluetooth_confirm.description: Do you want to set up {name}?

pairing_timeout.description:
The device did not enter pairing mode. Click Submit to try again.

### Troubleshooting
1. Check that the device isn't connected to the mobile app.
2. Unplug the device for 5 seconds, then plug it back in.
